Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: It is thus confirmed that the histological characteristics of myopathic rat muscle induced experimentally are extraordinarily similar to those of human myopathy as confirmed during biopsies performed at the Orthopaedic Traumatological Centre , Florence .

| human myopathy |
| myopathic rat muscle |

In the given paragraph, the two disease entities mentioned are "human myopathy" and "myopathic rat muscle". These are mentioned in the context of their histological characteristics being similar.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

In the revised analysis, the only clear disease entity mentioned in the paragraph is "human myopathy". The other entity, "myopathic rat muscle", while related to a disease, is not a disease itself, but rather a description of a muscle affected by a disease.
